title: Gold and rainbow color styling updates with chapter editing

requirements.text: Change all text colors to gold throughout the application, excluding status field text

quotes: make all texts, watchlist outlines, and icons gold color, except for the status

acceptanceCriteria: All text elements display in gold color
Status field text retains its current color scheme
Gold color is applied consistently across all pages and components

requirements.text: Change watchlist card outlines to gold color by default

quotes: make all texts, watchlist outlines, and icons gold color

acceptanceCriteria: All manga card borders/outlines display in gold color
Gold outline is visible in all states except hover

requirements.text: Implement rainbow color outline for watchlist cards on hover

quotes: Make the outline of the watchlist that the mouse is currently hovering over turn rainbow color instead

acceptanceCriteria: When hovering over a manga card, its outline transitions to rainbow color
Rainbow effect is smooth and visually appealing
Hover effect only applies to the currently hovered card

requirements.text: Change all icons throughout the application to gold color, excluding status-related icons

quotes: make all texts, watchlist outlines, and icons gold color, except for the status

acceptanceCriteria: All icon elements display in gold color
Status field icons retain their current color scheme
Icons maintain proper visibility and contrast against backgrounds

requirements.text: Change filter and search input text colors to gold in MangaListControls

quotes: also make sure the filters and search texts are gold color

acceptanceCriteria: Search input text displays in gold color
Filter labels and text display in gold color
Placeholder text is visible with appropriate gold shade

requirements.text: Make the 'Incomplete' status text turn red when selected in status filters or displays

quotes: Make the Incomplete text on 'status' turn red when selected

acceptanceCriteria: When 'Incomplete' status is selected or active, its text appears in red
Red color is applied specifically to the 'Incomplete' status option
Other status options maintain their default colors

requirements.text: Fill the rating star icon with gold color

quotes: Fill the rating star icon with the color gold

acceptanceCriteria: Star icons used for ratings are filled with solid gold color
Gold fill is visible and distinct from outline or empty state

requirements.text: Make rating numbers display in rainbow color when the rating is 8.0 or higher

quotes: Make the rating numbers turn rainbow color if it is 8 or above

acceptanceCriteria: Rating numbers >= 8.0 display in rainbow gradient color
Rating numbers < 8.0 maintain default gold color
Rainbow effect is visually clear and readable

requirements.text: Make the chapters read/chapters available display in MangaCard clickable to allow inline editing of chapter progress

quotes: Let me edit the 'chapters read/chapters available' from the watchlist by clicking on the number display area

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking on the chapter progress display (e.g., '5/12') makes it editable
User can update the chapters read value inline
Changes are saved to the backend when editing is completed
Visual feedback indicates the field is editable (cursor change, hover effect)
Pressing Enter or clicking outside saves the change; Escape cancels

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo actor architecture
Do not edit immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, and components/ui directory
Preserve all existing functionality while adding color and interaction changes
nonGoals: Changing the overall black background theme
Modifying authentication or profile setup flows
Adding new fields to manga entries beyond chapter editing
